entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Sending of Content-Length with TRACE method is not RFC compliant #101357
    Future
  • `Dns.GetHostAddressesAsync` roots diagnostic types even if they are not used or disabled (trimming) #101355
  • Replace deprecated SecTrustGetCertificateAtIndex API in System.Security.Cryptography.Native.Apple #101349
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Recyclable Memory Stream #101348
  • Chained comparison of two integers against a constant is not coalesced #101347
    Future

Closed

  • Clean up CORINFO_HELP_ASSIGN_BYREF for x86/x64 #67707
    9.0.0
  • Perf: JIT sometimes does not elide duplicate checks across inlined methods #69080
    Future
  • GeneratedComInterfaceAttribute can cause error CS0111: Type 'InterfaceImplementation' already defines a member called 'ABI_Blah' with the same parameter types #101242
  • [API Proposal]: Expand GetValueOrDefault in CollectionExtensions to allow IDictionary, not just IReadOnlyDictionary #101311
  • Decompressing GZipStream produces invalid data #101351
  • Misleading error message when referenced assembly is built for different CPU architecture than project #101271
  • Array bounds check is not eliminated if index passed by reference #10649
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • JIT: Remove Compiler::fgCanonicalizedFirstBB #101358
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement WriteStringValueSegment defined in Issue 67337 #101356
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Simplify managed MetadataImport creation #101353
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Fix unnecessary bounds check with ulong index #101352
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 124.0.6367.60, windows: 123.0.6312.123 #101345
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono

Merged

  • Remove some more unnecessary volatile read/write #101346
    area-Meta
  • Avoid unnecessary lazy init in StructuralComparisons #101344
    area-System.Collections
  • Remove more helper frames #100939
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Reduce frozen collection creation overheads for ignore-case with ASCII values #100998
    area-System.Collections

Updated

  • [mono] Interpret static constructors without a runtime invoke wrapper #101324
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • JIT: Move profile checking back until just before inlining #101011
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Refresh cached credentials after PreAuthenticate fails #101053
    area-System.Net.Http
  • JIT: Rewrite initial parameter frame layout in terms of new ABI info #101340
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Test Only] Async interruptions on safepoints with callsite fixups #101341
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-CodeGen-coreclr, runtime-coreclr
  • Allow async interruptions on safepoints #95565
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Handle > 64 registers + predicate registers for Arm64 #98258
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasi] Implement TODO in mono-threads-wasi.S #101337
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Add support for Sve.UnzipEven/Odd & Sve.ZipHighLow #101294
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • Annotate `config.GetValue()` with `[NotNullIfNotNull]` #101336
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Add option to change SVE vector length for current and children processes #101295
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • [Test Only] Ignore, just to run some tests. #99339
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add Count*BitElements #101188
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • [cdac] Read contract descriptor from target #101208
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Bump minimum Apple OS versions #101342
    area-Infrastructure
  • [browser] More meaningful code in browser template #101287
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • CI Test #100951
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • Update EOL versions in release/8.0-staging #101073
    Servicing-approved, test-enhancement, area-Infrastructure
  • Reapply params ReadOnlySpan overloads without params keyword #101308
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
